title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8B.20 - TRAINS MAY EXCEED 80 MPH Sign (W10-8)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8B.20 - TRAINS MAY EXCEED 80 MPH Sign (W10-8)

State Regulations
INSERT the following paragraph: Standard: 00A The TRAINS MAY EXCEED 80 MPH (W10-8) sign and similar
signs shall be used only where authorized by the New York State Department of

Transportation. The TRAINS MAY EXCEED 80 MPH sign and similar signs shall not
be used at crossings where the EXEMPT (R15-3P) regulatory plaque is
used. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8B.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
